text: You do not have time for this right now.
You do not have time for this right now.

As we stalk through the ancient forests of Tol Elithis, we come upon a group of High Elf intruders defiling our sacred groves. Their fate hangs in the balance, and I must decide whether to draw my bow and protect our realm with lethal precision or show them mercy and hope they learn the error of their ways amidst our enchanting woods.

As we silently navigate the mystical realm of Tol Elithis, we stumble upon a Cathay civilian merchants trespassing in our ancient woods. Facing the feeble Cathay intruders in our sacred realm of Tol Elithis, we confront a stark decision â€“ to either extend mercy and spare them, offering a chance for redemption amidst our enchanted woods, or to ruthlessly massacre them, ensuring they pose no further threat to our realm.
Only through unity can the Worldroots be maintained.
The local Asrai can be left to tend the Grove.
